mapper.select: SELECT partner.* FROM users INNER JOIN partner ON users.user_no = partner.user_no WHERE users.user_no = #{userId}
SELECT r.*, u.user_name AS reviewer_name FROM review r JOIN users u ON r.user_no = u.user_no WHERE r.partner_no = #{partnerNo}
SELECT u.user_name FROM users u JOIN partner p ON u.user_no = p.user_no WHERE p.partner_no = #{partnerNo}

SELECT p.service_date FROM payment p JOIN order_item oi ON p.orders_no = oi.orders_no JOIN service s ON oi.service_no = s.service_no JOIN partner par ON s.partner_no = par.partner_no WHERE par.partner_no = #{partnerNo}
